DOC.criteria: Women undergo fresh vitro fertilization treatment use egg donor egg . Subject least 18 year age . Subject basal antral follicle count ( BAFC ) ≥ 12 prior stimulation cycle . Subject least 8 normally fertilize egg ( 2PN ) Willing 2PN embryo monitor Eeva Willing comply study protocol procedure able speak English . Willing provide write informed consent .
